titleStmt.title: The souldiers manual, or, Directions, prayers, and ejaculations for such as lead a military life. By A member of the Athenian Society.
titleStmt.author: Member of the Athenian Society.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Dawks, for John Dunton, at the Raven in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
